website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural choice with the added benefits of bovine colostrum for immunity support.
pros: Perfect for sensitive babies, this formula is free of added sugar, gluten, flavoring, and hormones
Multiple probiotic strains, 6 total strains and 5 billion active cultures, cover various health needs
The convenient powder is flavorless and can be added to any cool drink
Parents report that it is an effective solution to common baby conditions such as colic, and constipation
cons: Although many parents saw positive effects in their babies' digestive issues, some parents noticed it made their babies even gassier

customer_reviews.title: No more reflux or constipation!
customer_reviews.text: It's been several days, and already we're seeing a huge difference in our 10-month-old. She has had reflux since birth and until recently continued to struggle with it. Also, every couple months we would try baby oatmeal to help with her reflux, but it caused so much constipation. Now, the last few days she has had no spit-up or food related pain that I can tell, and the truly amazing thing is that we gave her oatmeal yesterday and the day before, and today she has already pooped twice! No more issues whatsoever. Genius product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Harp

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: My baby had two rounds of antibiotics in a row and had the worst diaper rash. Probably too late to the game I decided to try probiotics. He was probably half way through his second course of 10 days of antibiotics. I saw an improvement within a day or two. He was having less diarrhea/sick looking bowel movements and it continued to improve. I mixed a pouch into a small amount of yogurt with his lunch daily and he eats it right up with no issues. This is probably the best infant probiotic I've ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan E. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Measure 1/8 Teaspoon for Half Packet
customer_reviews.text: Agree with other reviewers that say using a half packet is a little challenging but each packet is about 1/4 teaspoon so I measure out 1/8 teaspoon for the dosage and put the rest in a small resealable container in my fridge. It doesn’t have to be difficult! And my baby will be 4 months soon so he can graduate to the full packet per day. Either way, it’s a very economical choice compared to other probiotics on the market and it seems to work just as well as the previous probiotic we were using (Gerber drops)
customer_reviews.author: Loves2Read

customer_reviews.title: Worked for our two month old  with acid reflex
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for our two month old baby. She was having bad reflux and improved within a few days of starting this. She still spits up a lot but the acid is greatly reduced, and she is not unhappy and fussy like before. She seems to be a lot more comfortable now. This was able to prevent us from putting her on acid reflux medication. Packet sizes for under four months old need split into two doses though, and that is not easy to measure out. That would be my only negative comment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics are best when kept chilled and since these are shipped via ...
customer_reviews.text: I was using this product for my son starting at about 3 months old. The packets have to be split into two doses if child is 4 months or under. It is near impossible to be able to tell what you're getting out of the package this way. Also, I don't really think that the stuff was effective. Probiotics are best when kept chilled and since these are shipped via regular shipping, I'm sure that messes with their effectiveness. I'm going to try and buy a different brand that comes in a jar from a local health foods store next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A. Torres

customer_reviews.title: It really Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I initially started with lovebug probiotic and was happy with it until its not available, so i started looking for another. I found upspring and LOVE IT! 1st its better priced, 2nd has double the power and my son is doin even better than before with lovebugs. He is 8 weeks now, breastfed and has bad gas n problems goin poo. This changed it up for us. He has no more pain trying to poo. He goes now and we dont know it cuz he is quiet n pain free getting it out! I am so in love and sticking with Upspring!
customer_reviews.author: N H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This product is spectacular and worth the money. I started giving my child the probiotics when she was 3 weeks old. She use to have issues with gas and thowing up often (at least 2-3 times a week.) Since we have been using the probiotics, she has not thrown up once. Its been over five weeks. The closest thing to throwing up she has done is cough and have a few drops of milk come back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful giving to baby under 1yo. Contains milk
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I totally didn't even think of the fact that this contains milk from cows. I was excited to have an item that seemed like it had such good qualities. However, shortly after buying it my LO got sick. He was 10mo. He started getting congested and a runny nose. We played around and stopped using it and it seemed his symptoms improved when we stopped using this. I sent it back. I also bought these for older kids...they're gross to pour into a glass of water or a drink. They don't totally dissolve and it was very unappealing trying to drink and it went to waste.
customer_reviews.author: PrivateUser

customer_reviews.title: Works great for oral thrush!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this probiotic because I had read that it might help when your kiddo has oral thrush. My 4 month old had been on medicine 4 times and gentian violet and it still wasn’t working. He would get it right back. After 1 dose of the probiotic I noticed his tongue was clearing up. It got better with each dose! So now we keep giving it to him so he will be happy and healthy. He drinks his formula with it with no problem so it must not taste like anything to him. We are hoping his reflux issues will clear up as well. He’s only been on it a little over a week so it’s work in progress.
customer_reviews.author: M. Chavez

customer_reviews.title: I think this is super effective
customer_reviews.text: A little annoying to split the contents of the packet in half but a good product... My husband caught the cold, I did next and then my uncle and we all live in the same house. i was very scared that he would get sick too but I just made sure he takes his probiotics + colostrum daily and praise God he never got sick at all! So maybe this stuff works hehe...
customer_reviews.author: Kai&Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Some packets were empty
customer_reviews.text: These would’ve been great if all of the packets had powder in them. I probably opened atleast 4 packets that were almost empty.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Constipated baby! Not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: When my baby started solids, about 2 months in to it, she was soooooo constipated. She cried everytime she had a bowel movement. So, in search of a remedy, I looked for probiotics for babies. I used to purchase Lacfido L probiotics, but this time around I wanted a probiotics that also had colostrum. So I chose UpSpring. I gave my baby one packet every morning after her first feeding. As you can see in the picture, I mixed it with some yogurt. (A bit gritty but she had no problem eating) After about 3-4days, she started to poop normally and with much ease!! Still smells horrendous lol but this probiotics worked wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: quickbee

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be working!
customer_reviews.text: So far I gave it to my 7 month old once. It made her a little fussy and gassy but I know that just means there's probiotics in there, as that can be very common. She has no health issues, but I just want to make sure she is getting probiotics. Will use every few days or so...and will start putting on son's food (3years) as well, but have to wait until he eats something cold like ice cream. Very happy this product exists!! And it is so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Aaryn

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you are looking for.  I am in it for the colostrum benefits
customer_reviews.text: Product has no flavor but I mix it with fruit so it's good to my little one. It's easy tip use simply mix w/ breast milk, formula, or food. The value is good for the money. I just stopped nursing my 12 mo but want the benefits of colostrum so I stopped using my other probiotics and started this one. I can't say if it's gourd or bad, baby doesn't have stomach trouble but ever now and again he will have kind of hard stool but it's still passible.
customer_reviews.author: Holleighwood

customer_reviews.title: Helped regulate baby after antibiotics!
customer_reviews.text: We originally looked at getting probiotics while our young baby had thrush, in an effort to help it clear up faster. He then got an ear infection, then a round of antibiotics. After doing loads of research, we decided to purchase these due to the high probiotic count and number of strains. It took about 2 weeks (doing half-doses for our 3 mo old) for his stools to normalize. We continue to give them daily in a bottle. He hates flavored things (he spits out medicine and even formula), but drinks this without a problem! The packets are convenient, but difficult to split into half-doses. We will be sticking with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't increase spit-up but not easy to portion out when using the half portion
customer_reviews.text: I can't give too detailed of a review; I use this with my 6 week old so I have no idea how it tastes. My main comment is my pet peeve with the packaging: the dosage for 0-4 months is half a packet each day. There's no possible way I can measure half a packet so I'm just guesstimating, which usually ends up with most of it in one day's portion so there's just a tiny amount in the other. We're using formula so I just add it to her bottle and, thankfully, it doesn't increase the amount she spits up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great immune booster for our little ones.
customer_reviews.text: So far has been a great product. Our daughter usually can tell if we’ve added a vitamin of some kind to her morning drink. However, with this product she hasn’t noticed, so that’s a plus. We have noticed a great boost in her immune system and it truly appears to protect her from viruses and other common illnesses spread among little ones. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't pooped since taking it!
customer_reviews.text: Unclear if this is providing anything to our baby. He's actually pooped less this week since we've added it to his intake. UPDATE: After a week of this, our baby has become so constipated and gassy. He's started waking up at night in pain.
customer_reviews.author: P$

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for our baby
customer_reviews.text: Our little one was having issues with gas so our lactation consultant recommended adding a probiotic. I liked that this product also contained colostrum, though wasn’t sure if bovine would have an impact. Unfortunately this made our son spit up terribly for three days, especially the bottle with the powder added. We discontinued and the spit up issue ceased. May be great for some but not a fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We used this probiotic when our son was a baby and it really helped with his reflux and keeping him regular. We stopped using the product when he was about 6 months or so and just recently started using again when our son was having stomach issues. Once again, the product worked great. We will keep him on this probiotic moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my twins were born via c section and I have read that getting them early exposure to gut bacteria (which doesn't happen when they don't go through the birth canal) helps prevent allergies. Time will tell with that. But, these are easy to use. At the beginning it made the babies' poo smell like yogurt which I take as a sign the bacteria are indeed working. We never had any issues with colic or bowel problems, so this may have helped with that.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: My almost 1 year old loves drinking this, which makes it easy to give it to her. She cries for more. We got home late one night and she didnt get her nightly probiotic and the next day she didnt poop on schedule at all. This definitely keeps her regular and her belly happy. We started it after 2 rounds of intense antibiotics and it helped get her gut health back immediately. Weve tried all the baby probiotics over the years with my older daughter and we love this one the best.
customer_reviews.author: Austin E.

customer_reviews.title: No change not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t notice a difference when I gave to my son. It is tasteless so you can Mix it with anything . Unfortunately it did not do anything. I used probiotics in the past and I know the effects it has on gut and immune system. Usually with in a week or 2 you notice a change in stool or stool pattern, improve digestion, clearer skin and increase in immunity. There was no change with this product . I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: treevnp

customer_reviews.title: The best !!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every other brand , this is the best coz it works !! I have my daughter this since birth as she had enormous amounts of gas .This is the only thing that worked.She was way less gassy when we used this and digested formula better.Not a day goes by that I don't add this to her diet.She is now 5months old.
customer_reviews.author: ManRi

customer_reviews.title: Great value and it works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with my sons (6 months) eczema as I’ve heard probiotics can help. It’s really brought down the flare ups and he doesn’t seem to mind taking it. I like that it helps with gut health especially during this cold/flu season. Priobiotics (especially for kids) are usually really pricey and this was such a great value for the price that I bought two boxes
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very effective and affordable probiotic for infants
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's flavorless and can be added to my baby's bottle. She use to stay constipated but as soon as i started this probiotic she started going daily i started off with half pack from time she was 3 months old to 4 1/2 or 5 months old and started a whole pack after she was 5 months old she still goes daily. And this is def cheaper way to go vs gerbers drops which are $20+ dollars for maybe a months worth.
customer_reviews.author: Tara M

customer_reviews.title: My baby is now 2 months old, we have ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby is now 2 months old, we have been using this for several weeks now. I bought this as she is only on formula and was getting constipated and with being such a new baby there are few things you can do to handle such a situation. This has definitely helped keep her regular.
customer_reviews.author: Claire L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality probiotic
customer_reviews.text: We've used this probiotic for our little guy for close to 2 years. He had reflux early on and it seemed to help as well as helping him bounce back from some antibiotic treatment for ear infections. If I had one complaint it would be about the amount of packaging as a result of the individual packets. If there was a way to minimize the packaging waste it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Great for Spectrum kids
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 4 year old boy on the spectrum . He had constipation issues among others . I found the L-ruerteri in this helps his oxytocin levels among other benefits and he’s actually quite warm and loving on it . It also helps keep him regular which is huge in our lives. It has many beneficial strains PLUS the colostrum which is GREAT for autism /ASD kids . Truly a must in this house. I know when I forgot to add it to his juice. I can tell in his mood and regularity . Just my opinion . I love this stuff .
customer_reviews.author: Gr8buffini

customer_reviews.title: Helps our baby survive the germs at daycare!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 mo old has this daily. I really do believe it has boosted his immune system and kept him regular.
customer_reviews.author: MLB

customer_reviews.title: No More Tummy Issues!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is less gassy, throws up much less, and is now pooping regularly. The pre measured powder packs makes it very easy to integrate into a bottle. No more messy liquids or guesswork! Best stuff ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Try it!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only product that has helped my 5 year old with constipation. We have tried many probiotics Over the years with no luck. In 2 days this product fixed his 5 years of hard poops like magic! I’ve also started my 6 month on it for the same problems and it works for her too. I’m a believer.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Gave child horrible diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: Gave my very constipated child horrible mucousy diarrhea and a blistery butt rash. It made a very happy baby into a colicky and fussy baby. Will not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of reflux for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: My little one was constipated and had bad reflux and gas bubbles. Even got colicky for a few weeks. This product has been helping to balance the tummy out, in under a week! I mix with 1/2 ounce of apple/prune juice. Baby is sleeping better and more calm now. The added Colostrum for immunity is a bonus for formula babies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and gave it to our 10 month old who is generally fussy and has constipation issues. Within an hour, we have an unclogged, happy baby. Night and day difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cothran

customer_reviews.title: Everyday use, keeps baby regular
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily with my 20 month daughter. I started using it when she was sick months and this helps keep her regular and assists with gut health. I don’t believe it has any taste because she’s never showed a sign of dislike when consuming in her milk or breast milk. The individual packets are super convenient for everyday and travel. I also double up on doses when she does get sick to help her overall. I highly recommend this probiotic for your babes!
customer_reviews.author: eklaer

customer_reviews.title: No change
customer_reviews.text: This stuff hasn’t really seemed to make a difference with my 5 week old. My pediatrician recommended I try a probiotic for my baby since he gets so much gas, regardless of the type of formula we use. He still has the same tummy issues and pains as always. The guessing game of what a half packet is, is a little annoying too.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Good product good service
customer_reviews.text: Good product good service. Our Dr. said this may help with the running nose and weather change sniffles And it does.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: Wish dosing was easier
customer_reviews.text: I really like this in theory, but it is easy to give too much to my newborn who then responds with an upset stomach. Will resume trying the "half packet" dose in a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old has caught the cold about 3-5 times this year and each time, she's completely miserable. As soon as she gets over it, she's sick again with something else. We've been using this for a week now, and I've notice a huge difference. She's less fussy, much happier and she sleeps a lot better at night. She's recovering from a sinus infection and this seems to be helping. *Fingers crossed* Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond.hunnie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my little one starting at 6 weeks, went from pooping 1x a week to being regular (daily). He hasn't had any gasiness from the product, it's actually helped with his previous gas problems. I do wish there was an easier way to split up a package(he takes half a pack), but happy with everything else. Not sure about immune rewards, only time will tell on that
customer_reviews.author: TRLB

customer_reviews.title: now I give it like every two days
customer_reviews.text: I started giving this to my daughter at age of 5 months, transition from formula to solid food, she would have really hard stool and still does (she is 14 months now). I never gave her this daily. In beginning, it was every other day, now I give it like every two days, I think it does help with her immune system and big help with her hard stool. This is will be my third order of it...if baby getting upset stomach, give it every other day or every few days might work.
customer_reviews.author: liveinpurity

customer_reviews.title: Will keep our daughter on this.
customer_reviews.text: Our ten year old daughter has suffered constipation her whole life. She exercises all the time eats extremely healthy but always had a problem. She’s been on this a week and it is amazing. She had to go right after drinking it. Also, she was really breaking out and this has completely changed her skin! We are going to start our 5 month old on this in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great product every baby should take!
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of this product, I can add to her bottle each morning and know she has a good dose of colostrum and probiotics to keep her healthy.
customer_reviews.author: afs80

customer_reviews.title: Only probiotic I use for my preemie
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been on this probiotic since coming home from the NICU. Being unable to breast feed, I wanted to be sure that she was still getting good stuff to counter act all of the things that she had been given in the hospital. This probiotic has also been a savior helping with colic and keeping regular dirty diapers. This is a must in our house!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver for my kids. The combination of probiotics and colostrum have helped my daughter regulate her bowel movements more often than not. She had such a terrible time prior to using the product. We are extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: marc fraser

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic it's the best . My baby had issues with constipation and acid reflux. Soon as I started giving her this probiotic everything got fixed. I try different ones and didn't made a difference but this one did so I have it on auto ship every month.
customer_reviews.author: laure

customer_reviews.title: Great for the value!
customer_reviews.text: My twins were on Evivo up until 9 months when I ran out of breast milk. Since Evivo doesn’t work without Mother’s milk, I needed to find something else. My son was waking up 2-3x at night screaming from gas pains. UpSpring worked on the 1st night! He only woke up once. UpSpring is comparable to Evivo but at a fraction of the cost. Definitely gonna continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Phan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My son is almost 18 months old and we have been using Upspring probotics daily since he was two months old. It’s worked great for his tummy troubles. We recently went without it for a few days because our local Target quit carrying it. It was a rough few days!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Lineberger

customer_reviews.title: This ended up stopping up my baby. He was ...
customer_reviews.text: This ended up stopping up my baby. He was miserable for days. I even tried giving him prune juice to counteract the constipation and he was still miserable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: It took a week but it seems to be helping my baby’s colic. The recommend “half pack” dose for younger babies is not very practical to figure out. I ended up just doing the whole pack. But baby doesn’t notice it in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. I bought it to boost my 1 year olds immunity during flu season. He hasn’t been sick since starting it. I give it once daily and he doesn’t seem to notice a change in flavor...has never pushed away a bottle that has it in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Olson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 month old. We are breast feeding and having lots of problems with thrush but baby doesn't have symptoms. So the doc doesn't want to treat baby. However, I am in a lot of pain so I am hoping this will help get rid of baby's thrush while I am treating myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Speaight

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price and benefit
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product and happy with the help it’s providing to my two kids. The powder doesn’t mix completely, so I feel like a lose some of the product stuck to the containers. It also causes liquid to foam if you try to shake it to mix. If you stir gently for a little bit, it doesn’t cause as much foam.
customer_reviews.author: Littles’ Mom

customer_reviews.title: Was hoping for a noticeable difference based on all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping for a noticeable difference based on all the positive reviews but hasn't really done anything for my baby. Too expensive for no results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby, happy mama.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different probiotics with my 4 month old and these are by far the best in my opinion. The other brands make her super gassy and irritable where these are gentle on her stomach.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Good. Seems to work great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 2 reasons. First, I had a colicky baby, and I had been told probiotics would help. Second, my daughter was on multiple antibiotics multiple times before she was 4 months old and she started having tummy issues and diarrhea. These problems resolved within a few days of using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good to Me
customer_reviews.text: I first started using probiotics for my baby when she was about to start daycare because I read that it helps with the immune system. UpSpring wasn’t the first product I selected, but it’s been my go to since we started using it. It’s a good value for the price and quantity, and my daughter doesn’t seem to notice any flavor difference in her milk. She is also rarely sick and seems to digest food well, including stage 1 solids.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Hadrick

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This product works. However, I bought it because it said no flavor. I tried it myself in water and there is a flavor. I’ve put it in juice and there is a flavor. The only way I can hide the flavor from my daughter is in super chocolatey chocolate milk.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving my son this probiotic for almost a month now and I am really liking it so far. It dissolves very easily into milk and he doesn't seem to notice a difference in taste. I have had trouble with other powder probiotics not dissolving into a drink very well which was frustrating. I use this probiotic along with the Upspring multi vitamin with iron liquid once a day. I think they both help a lot with his immune system. He is rarely sick and when he is he gets over quite quickly. I will definitely be repurchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Patzius

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.text: I like the individual packets, so I know I am giving my toddler the correct amount although sometimes they were hard to rip open, or I would rip them open and they would spill. They kept his tummy happy and his poops regular.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great for my little one
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my little one. Helped his immune system fight off colds and kept him from getting constipated. Definitely plan on ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: janeanoele0312

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product
customer_reviews.text: Upon reading reviews I was a little skeptical, but this product had been a miracle for our little guy (4months). He struggle with gas and colic and this has turned him into an angel. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Improve
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter stomach bothered her a lot. I started giving her this product. Her stomach has improved
customer_reviews.author: john joe mata

customer_reviews.title: Has helped support immune system
customer_reviews.text: We use these for our 3 year old with asthma and chronic congestion. Because he’s asthmatic it’s important to bump his immune system as much as possible during cold/flu season and we’ve seen great results from these. Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: K. Manna

customer_reviews.title: Best baby probiotic I have found
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. My daughter is 2 years old and I ave been using since se was about 3 months old. She had digestive problems and gasines and I tried a few different products before I found this. This was a game changer. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Neisi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: My kid is so picky and if he can taste anything odd or sweet he won’t eat/drink it. These easily dissolve in liquid and he will drink the whole thing. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Danielle G

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this probiotic for close to a year. I really helps my daughter with her bowel movements and is very easy to hide in milk or other drinks. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: m_schmidbauer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my son with Autism
customer_reviews.text: Best probiotic I’ve used! The foil packets keep the cultures live. Dissolves nicely. My 7 year old son with autism has to be snuck all his vitamins through his favorite v8 juice and, thankfully he can’t taste the probiotic in there. I ran out for two weeks and notice a huge decline in his behavior. I’ll never be without this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: My baby have it everyday. I trust is good. She never ever is sick
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Constipated infant relief!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's pediatrician recommended I give my 2 week old baby apple juice for constipation. While that works to soften her rabbit turds I wanted to fix the problem so I started using this for my formula fed infant. She was so constipated and fussy. Within 5 days she was having regular bowel movements and was a happy girl. I really like product can be stored at room temperature and have multiple strains.
customer_reviews.author: Jessers55

customer_reviews.title: Must have when on antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: When my son was 8 months old and was on antibiotics and it gave him very bad diarrhea, also he started not eating his food. After a few days on the probiotics he was back to being regular and eating his food again. He's now almost a year and a half and used it again recently to help with side effects due to antibiotics again and seemed to help. Very happy with this product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: YellowRose

customer_reviews.title: Baby digestive help
customer_reviews.text: My one year old was having digestive problems and the doctor thought it he was lactose intolerant. He suggested probiotics before we completely cut milk out of his diet. We switched to 1% and added a daily dose of UpSprings probiotics. I'm a proud mom of a happy healthy baby!

It doesn't have a taste so you can put it in milk or a drink and they don't notice it. It does make water slightly cloudy but its hardly noticed at all. Great Product!

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to help with digestion/tummy troubles. Seemed to help with pooping more regularly BUT he’s now covered in a ugly horrible rash from head to mid chest and all over his back. I’m assuming a reaction to the milk that’s in this product. Our doctor told us to stop it ASAP! Just when you think your helping them you end up hurting them. This product may be good for others but just not us!

product_meta.title: Kids Probiotic Plus Colostrum by Upspring Baby – Probiotic & Colostrum Powder Supplement Provides Immune Support and Supports Digestive Health to Assist with Colic, Gas, Constipation (30 Packets)
feature_bullets: COLOSTRUM PROVIDES ULTIMATE IMMUNITY SUPPORT with a complete range of antibodies make it the ideal probiotics for kids, toddlers and babies. Our colostrum for kids can be given to your 2 month old or your teenager. Mix in yogurt or any cool liquid.

5 BILLION ACTIVE CULTURES: Our kid and baby probiotics contain 5 BILLION ACTIVE CULTURES per dose that helps keep kids and babies healthy. This probiotic supplement can help provide constipation relief for kids and babies by acting as a gentle stool softener. Parents love saying goodbye to days without a bowel movement for their kids.

6 PROBIOTIC STRAINS: Including our Lactobacilillus and Bifidobacterium probiotic and prebiotics. Multiple prebiotics and probiotics strains are more beneficial in promoting overall dietary health for kids of all ages.

REDUCES DIGESTIVE UPSET: Our prebiotics and probiotics for kids may can provide colic comfort and help with the occasional gas, diarrhea, kids constipation, hard stools, and other tummy troubles. What’s even better is our probiotic powder for kids is sugar free.

Looking for the best kid probiotic? Look no further than our Shelf Stable UpSpring Childrens Probiotic. NO ARTIFICIAL ANYTHING! All natural, gluten free, sugar free, hormone free. Flavorless kids and toddler probiotic powder mixes easily with cool or room temperature food or drink. Made in the USA. Contains 30 individually packaged kids probiotic packets. Easy to mix with any liquid and no sugar unlike kids fiber gummies. *Packaging may vary slightly.
